data.message: Nobody is mentioning that Beyoncè was in this too. Both of these artists are in top ten album sales in the world. They clearly do not give a fuck who buys their shit. This song is more poetic for them, and i wouldnt doubt his album is that way also. Its justified. I’m excited to see what the album has to offer when it comes out, because i think by now em has mastered the game, im sure he has some fire tracks on it.

replies.message: Michael Jackson leads world highest album sales
Favour Michaels  i never said em or beyonce were #1. I said top ten
